heisig_chinese_memo: The secret of the flying dutchman is that it's made from a special compressed wood which makes the ship extra strong.  It doesn't look like a lot but this ship is made from enough material to build a multistory building.
Ru_trainchinese:
lóu: (сущ) этаж (здания); башня; (используется в названиях магазинов); арка
lóu: (сущ) высотное здание
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you drag (婁) a tree (木) for a watchtower
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The young taskmaster uses a wooden multistory building as a watchtower to get a better view of his rice-carrying women. "I can seeeee you! One! Two! Three!".
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " lou " sound. The original meaning is a house with two or more floors. "Said Wen": "The building, the heavy house. Congmu, Lousheng." Such as "Mencius. "Gaozixia": "Don't think about its roots, but in Qiqimo, the square inch wood can be higher than the Cen Tower." Zhu Xi's Note: "Cen Tower, the tower is as sharp as a mountain." "Han Shu. "Jiao Si Zhi": "When the alchemist said that the Yellow Emperor, it was the twelfth floor of the five cities, in order to wait for the gods to hold the period, and the name is to welcome the new year.

" Floor " generally refers to all vehicles, ships, city walls, etc. with upper floors, such as towers, vehicles, and ships. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. Xuangong Fifteen Years": "Climbing on the car, so that the Husong people will tell it." "Historical Records. "Leveling Book": "The boat that governs the building is more than ten feet high, with the flag on top, it is very strong."

" Floor " also means the first floor of a building. For example, Wang Zhihuan of the Tang Dynasty "Deng Guanquelou": "If you want to be a thousand miles away, you can go to the next level." "Xingshihengyan. Lu Wuhan hardly keeps matching colored shoes": "You and I moved upstairs to sleep, and you will know what happens at night."

" House " means tea houses, taverns, brothels and other places. For example, Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Beauty Chapter": "The brothel is close to the road, and the high gate is closed." Li Duan of the Tang Dynasty "Concubine Poor Life": "Tolerate the concubine's life song, and go to the old Xiangyang restaurant alone."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " lou " sound. The original meaning is a house with two or more floors.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「婁」聲。本義是兩層或以上的房屋。《說文》：「樓，重屋也。从木，婁聲。」如《孟子．告子下》：「不揣其本，而齊其末，方寸之木可使高於岑樓。」朱熹集注：「岑樓，樓之高銳似山者。」《漢書．郊祀志》：「方士有言黃帝時為五城十二樓，以候神人於執期，名曰迎年。」

　　「樓」泛指一切有上層的車船、城牆等，如城樓、樓車、樓船。如《左傳．宣公十五年》：「登諸樓車，使呼宋人而告之。」《史記．平準書》：「治樓船，高十餘丈，旗幟加其上，甚壯。」

　　「樓」也表示樓房的一層。如唐代王之渙〈登鸛雀樓〉：「欲窮千里目，更上一層樓。」《醒世恒言．陸五漢硬留合色鞋》：「你我兩口搬在他樓上去睡，看夜間有何動靜，便知就裏。」

　　「樓」表示茶肆、酒館、妓院等場所。如三國魏曹植〈美女篇〉：「青樓臨大路，高門結重關。」唐代李端〈妾薄命〉：「忍懷賤妾平生曲，獨上襄陽舊酒樓。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「婁」聲。本義是兩層或以上的房屋。

樓字的基本解释

樓
lóu
见“楼”。

樓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóu］
［《廣韻》落侯切，平侯，來。］
“楼1”的繁体字。
(1)两层及两层以上的房屋。
(2)指楼房的一层。
(3)城墙或土台上的建筑物。
(4)车、船有上层者，其上层称楼。
(5)指车的上部和车盖。
(6)茶肆、酒店、歌舞厅及旧时妓院等场所也称楼。
(7)形容层层叠叠。参见“樓松”、“樓子”。
(8)形容高大，华丽。参见“樓殿”、“樓館”。
(9)见“樓羅”。
(10)见“樓樓”。
(11)姓。秦有楼缓；汉有楼护。
[②]［lǘ］
［《集韻》龍珠切，平虞，來。］
“楼2”的繁体字。
见“離樓”。

樓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页549第31
【唐韻】落侯切【集韻】【韻會】郞侯切【正韻】盧侯切，?音婁。【說文】重屋也。【爾雅·釋宮】四方而高曰臺，狹而脩曲曰樓。【釋名】樓謂牖戸之閒有射孔，樓樓然也。　又偵敵之車曰飛樓，亦曰樓車。【六韜·軍略篇】視城中則有飛樓。【左傳·宣十五年】解揚登諸樓車，呼宋人而告之。　又岑樓，山之銳嶺。【孟子】方寸之木，可使高於岑樓。　又譙樓，城樓也。【前漢·陳勝傳】戰譙門中。又謂之戍樓。【儲光羲·送別詩】寒雲隱戍樓。　又樓蘭，國名。見【前漢·昭帝紀】。　又【爾雅·釋詁】樓，聚也。　又【爾雅·釋草】果臝之實栝樓。【註】齊人呼爲天瓜。　又道家以兩肩爲玉樓。【蘇軾·雪詩】凍合玉樓寒起粟。　又姓。【姓苑】望出東陽，周封少康之裔爲東樓公，子孫因氏焉。　又叶凌如切，音閭。【古·日出東南隅行】日出東南隅，照我秦氏樓。秦氏有好女，自名爲羅敷。　又離樓，衆木交加之貌。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】嶔崟離樓。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】栝樓，果臝之實。【註】齊

floor
Basic explanation of words
floor
lóu
See "lou".
floor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lóu］
["Guangyun" Luohou cut, Pinghou, come. ]
Traditional characters for "楼1".
(1) Two-story and more than two-story houses.
(2) Refers to the first floor of a building.
(3) Buildings on city walls or earth platforms.
(4) If the vehicle or ship has an upper layer, the upper layer is called a building.
(5) Refers to the upper part and cover of the car.
(6) Tea shops, hotels, dance halls and old brothels are also called buildings.
(7) Describe the stacking of layers. See "lousong", "louzi".
(8) Describe tall and gorgeous. See "lou hall", "lou hall".
(9) See "Luo Luo".
(10) See "loulou".
(11) Last name. Qin has a building slow; Han has a building guard.
[②] [lǘ]
["Jiyun" Dragon Ball Cut, Pingyu, come. ]
Traditional characters for "楼2".
See "Leaving the Building".
floor
